fields.name: -Pixelate:
fields.value:
Target a player. If the ability they use has multiple effects, it is reduced to only the first one. **Locked**: In addition, you learn what effects, if any, were canceled.
-Surprise Attack: Deal an Astral Basic Attack to a player. **Locked**: If the target is hacking a node tonight, anyone else hacking that node will have their success chances reduced by 5% (ie 20% -> 15%)
-Obstruct (**Locked**, 2-shot): Choose a node on the network. All hack attempts on it will fail tonight. This cannot be used on the Master Node.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
-Players killed by you will appear as **Collapsed by PixelRoggle**
-**Locked**: Each night, you may choose a node. You will appear to be hacking it to any Investigative that detect visits or hacks.
-**Unlock Condition**: If the NETSEC was the largest ‘Good’ faction at the start of the game, Unlock.
